Event Highlights
The fun continues all year long at Epperson Lagoon and we invite you to check out our full calendar of activities. Events are included with the purchase of a day pass unless ticket price is noted.
End of Summer Luau
Sunday, August 31 | 7pm
Join us on Sunday for an End of Summer Luau! This island-inspired evening will feature fire dancers, specialty cocktails, and more. Throw on your favorite tropical attire and come enjoy the fun!
Epic Day of Play
Monday, September 1
Join us this Labor Day for an epic day packed with fun for all ages! Dance to live music from a high energy DJ on the main stage and unleash your competitive side with our on-site Game Truck. We will also have inflatables for you to jump into the fun.
Explore Labor Day at the Lagoon
MetroLagoons is proud to partner with local food truck vendors to bring even more flavor and variety to your Lagoon day. Enjoy these options as well as our regular on-site food and beverage options!
Explore Upcoming Food Trucks

Lagoon Living Has Its Perks
You can live your best life as a resident member of Epperson. Resident members have full access to a vibrant beachfront lifestyle where each day feels like a vacation, and a year-round calendar full of community events and entertainment.

Tags
Event Highlights
The fun continues all year long at Brightwater Lagoon, and we invite you to explore our full calendar of activities. Events are included with admission unless ticket price is noted.
Cigar Night
Friday, August 29 | 8pm
Meet us in Cabana Cove to enjoy a cigar and live Caribbean Pan music! Sport your best Hawaiian shirt and enter our Hawaiian Shirt Contest for a chance to win a $25 MetroLagoons gift card. This event is open to the public. Both Resident Members and non-Resident Members must register for this event.
Public RSVP
Resident Member RSVP
Live DJs & Watermelon Eating Contest
Monday, September 1
Spend Labor Day at the Lagoon! We will have live DJs from 9:30-5 and a Watermelon Eating Contest from 2pm-3pm.
Explore Labor Day at the Lagoon
MetroLagoons is proud to partner with local food truck vendors to bring even more flavor and variety to your Lagoon day. Enjoy these options as well as our regular on-site food and beverage options!
Explore Upcoming Food Trucks

Lagoon Living Has Its Perks
You can live your best life as a resident member of Brightwater. Resident members have full access to a vibrant beachfront lifestyle where each day feels like a vacation, and a year-round calendar full of community events and entertainment.
